toolCards.name: Forest Wrath
toolCards.description: Attack all enemies. Deal 10 bonus pure DMG per debuffed allies.

curseCards.name: Blackmail
curseCards.description: Apply {Taunt} to your furthest Axie for 2 turns. If this is not used, put it onto the top of your draw pile. <Banish>.

curseCards.name: Burn
curseCards.description: <Unplayable>. <Ethereal>. At the end of your turn, all allies take 8 damage.

curseCards.name: Jinx
curseCards.description: <Unplayable>. <Ethereal>. At the end of your turn, your furthest Axie takes 15 damage.

curseCards.name: Void
curseCards.description: <Unplayable>. <Ethereal>. When you draw 1 or more [Void], lose 1 Energy.

abilities.name: Bubble
abilities.description: Block 5 DMG/stack. Max: 3 stack. Turn into Bubble Bomb upon reaching 3 stacks.

abilities.name: Bubble Bomb
abilities.description: Next attack explodes Bubble Bomb and deals 20 DMG to all Enemies.

abilities.name: Cleanser
abilities.description: Each stack negates 1 debuff applied on the target.

abilities.name: Damage Boost
abilities.description: The target has Attack DMG increased by 1 per stack.

abilities.name: Feather
abilities.description: When Axie does an attack, consume all Feather stacks to deal 2 bonus DMG per stack and heal 2 HP per stack. Max : 10 stack.

abilities.name: Healing Boost
abilities.description: Increase healing card effects to this unit by 1 HP per stack.

abilities.name: Leaf
abilities.description: Regen 5 HP at the end of your turn. Max stack: 5

abilities.name: Meditate
abilities.description: Meditate for 2 turns. If attacked while Meditating, awake and gain 3 Rage. If not, Cleanse 1 debuff and gain 1 Energy after effect ends.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.description: DMG is increases by 2 per Rage stack. Transform into Fury Form when reaches 10 Rage stack.

abilities.name: Shield Boost
abilities.description: The target has Shield gained from cards increased by 1 per stack.

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: The target cannot be targeted directly. If it uses a card, remove Stealth.

abilities.name: Banish
abilities.description: Remove the card from your deck until the end of battle.

abilities.name: Cleanse
abilities.description: Remove debuffs from target, up to 5 stacks.

abilities.name: Deck
abilities.description: Includes cards in Draw Pile and Discard Pile.

abilities.name: Dispel
abilities.description: Remove 1 buff from target, up to 5 stacks.

abilities.name: Ethereal
abilities.description: When your turn ends, if the card is still in your hand, banish it. Banished cards are removed from your deck until the end of battle.

abilities.name: Initial
abilities.description: The first card played in a turn.

abilities.name: Innate
abilities.description: Start each battle with this card in your hand.

abilities.name: Retain
abilities.description: Do not discard the card at the end of your turn.

abilities.name: Scry
abilities.description: Look at the top cards of your draw pile. You may discard any of them.

abilities.name: Solo
abilities.description: Only 1 Axie per team can have this Effect activated.

abilities.name: Unplayable
abilities.description: The card cannot be played.

abilities.name: Bleed
abilities.description: Whenever the target uses a card, it loses 15HP.

abilities.name: Death Mark
abilities.description: Whenever opponent plays an Attack Card, the target take 13 DMG per Energy spent.

abilities.name: Disarmed
abilities.description: The target cannot use Attack cards.

abilities.name: Doubt
abilities.description: The target gains 20% less HP from Healing.

abilities.name: Fear
abilities.description: Whenever the target uses an Attack card, shuffle a Confused into its draw pile.

abilities.name: Fragile
abilities.description: The target gains 20% less Shield from cards.

abilities.name: Heal Block
abilities.description: The target cannot be healed.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Whenever the target uses a non-Attack card, shuffle a Confused into its draw pile.

abilities.name: Poison
abilities.description: At the start of its turn, the target loses 3 HP per stack and stacks are reduced by 1. Max: 30 stacks.

abilities.name: Silence
abilities.description: The target cannot use non-Attack cards.

abilities.name: Sleep
abilities.description: The target cannot use cards. If it is attacked, remove Sleep.

abilities.name: Stunned
abilities.description: The target cannot perform any action.

abilities.name: Vulnerable
abilities.description: The target receives 20% more attack damage.

abilities.name: Weak
abilities.description: The target deals 20% less attack damage.

abilities.name: Taunt
abilities.description: The target is always targeted by enemy's attack abilities.

abilities.name: Fury
abilities.description: Gain 1 Energy when transforms. Deal double damage and last for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Steal
abilities.description: Deal pure DMG and gain HP.

runes.name: Leftover Potion
runes.effect: Recover 4% of max HP at the end of your turn.

runes.name: Mini Legion
runes.effect: Summoned units have +10 max HP. Deal +2 DMG per Summon to all Enemies at the beginning of your turn.

runes.name: Thick Shield
runes.effect: Gain 10 bonus Shield from cards.

runes.name: Tough Strike
runes.effect: Non Multihit Attack Abilities deal 10 bonus DMG.

runes.name: Pure Instinct
runes.effect: All cards gain 15% {Class Bonus}.

runes.name: Shady Exchange
runes.effect:
{Solo}. +1 energy on even numbered turns.
Add 3 [Daze] to your deck.

runes.name: Pure Power
runes.effect: Attack Abilities gain 15% {Class Bonus}.

runes.name: Pure Skill
runes.effect: Heal and Shield Abilities gain 15% {Class Bonus}.

runes.name: Bloodlust
runes.effect: Non-Multihit Attacks {Steal} 15 HP. Multihit Attacks {Steal} 4 HP per hit.

runes.name: Heart of Ocean
runes.effect: {Solo}. Increase all Axies' HP by 50.

runes.name: Calcium Armor
runes.effect:
Axie HP +30
At the beginning of your turn, gain Shield equal to 3% of max HP.

runes.name: Hearty Warrior
runes.effect:
Axie max HP +30
Attack cards deal bonus DMG equal to 3% of remaining HP.

runes.name: Dominant Predator
runes.effect:
Deal 20% more DMG against Bleeding Enemies
Take 10% less DMG from Bleeding Enemies

runes.name: Endless Anger
runes.effect: {Solo}. Gain 2 {Rage} when your turn starts. Each {Rage} grant 1 bonus DMG.

runes.name: Pangolin Scale
runes.effect: Cannot gain Shield. Take 25% less DMG.

runes.name: Reckless Hunter
runes.effect:
Deal 20% more DMG.
Take 10% more DMG.

runes.name: Raven's Tactic
runes.effect: Deal 20% bonus DMG if HP is above 50%. Take 20% less DMG if HP is below 50%.

runes.name: Feather Descend
runes.effect: {Solo}. When your turn starts, grant 2 {Feather} to your team. This Axie gains back half of the Feather stacks consumed when doing a non-multihit attack.

runes.name: Energy Guru
runes.effect: Attack cards also deal 5 DMG per Energy Cost to all Enemies.

runes.name: Venom Born
runes.effect: {Poison} on this Axie grants "Healing 1 HP per stack" instead of HP loss.

runes.name: Collect And Protect
runes.effect: In odd Rounds, draw 1 Additional Card when your turn starts. In even Rounds, gain 30 Shield when your turn starts.

runes.name: Sturdy Fighter
runes.effect: {Solo}. Non-Multihit Attack cards deal bonus DMG equal to current Shield.

runes.name: Shield Leecher
runes.effect: When your turn starts, steal 50% Shield from the Enemy with the highest Shield.

runes.name: Vault Builder
runes.effect: When your turn ends, gain Shield equal to (3 x the number of cards in your Discard Pile).

runes.name: Heaven's Echoes
runes.effect: Your allies gain 1 {Damage Boost} whenever this Axie attacks. Your allies gain 8 Shield whenever this Axie uses a Skill.

runes.name: Holy Prayer
runes.effect: {Solo}. When your turn starts, remove 2 Curses in your {Deck}. Heal 10 HP and grant 1 DMG boost to all teammates when successfully removing a Curse this way.

runes.name: Arcane Protection
runes.effect: Take 5% less DMG per Buff on this Axie (capped at 20%).

runes.name: Celestial Might
runes.effect: Deal 5% more DMG per Buff on this Axie (capped at 20%).

runes.name: Malediction
runes.effect: Deal 10% more DMG against debuffed Enemies. Take 20% less DMG from debuffed Enemies

runes.name: Gloomy Dice
runes.effect: {Solo}. Apply {Hex} or {Fear} randomly to all enemies for 2 turns in Odd Rounds.

runes.name: Cursed Ritual
runes.effect: Attacks deal 3 bonus DMG per Curse Ability in your {Deck} (capped at 15 DMG).

runes.name: Wicked Ward
runes.effect: Gain 15 Shield whenever you play a Curse card.

runes.name: Adaptive Program
runes.effect: Gain 10 bonus Shield from cards. Gain 3 {Damage Boost} whenever using a Shield card.

runes.name: Shield Backup
runes.effect:
{Solo}. This Axie's Shield isn't removed when your enemy's turn ends.
Shield can absorb 50% more DMG.

runes.name: Last Stand
runes.effect:
When taking a fatal hit, survive with 1 HP until end of turn (active 1 time per battle).
After that, apply an irremovable {Heal Block}.

runes.name: Zap Armor
runes.effect: Deal 20% more DMG if this Axie has Shield.

runes.name: Rise And Ruin
runes.effect: Add [Forest Breath] and [Forest Wrath] to your deck.

runes.name: Gaia's Embrace
runes.effect: {Solo}. Shield cards also restore HP equal to 100% of shield gained but grant 25% less shield.

runes.name: Healing Pulse
runes.effect: All teammates regen 4 HP when your turn ends. Increase healing card effects by 10%.

runes.name: Miracle Leaf
runes.effect: Start Battle with 3 {Leaf}. Non-Multihit Attacks consume 1 {Leaf} and deal 15 bonus DMG

runes.name: Poison Touch
runes.effect: Apply 1 {Poison} to Attacker. Take 20% less DMG from poisoned enemies.

runes.name: Regenerator
runes.effect: {Solo}. When your turn start, {Cleanse} 2 random debuffs if HP is above 75% or recover 10% of max HP if not.

runes.name: Delayed Protection
runes.effect: When your turn starts, gain 12 Shield for each attack this Axie took in the previous turn.

runes.name: Venom Master
runes.effect:
Attack cards apply 1 additional {Poison}.
Non-Multihit Attacks deal 1 bonus DMG per 2 {Poison} on target.
